00006 #ifndef CUPP_kernel_call_traits_H
00007 #define CUPP_kernel_call_traits_H
00008 
00009 #include "cupp_runtime.h"
00010 #include "shared_device_pointer.h"
00011 
00012 namespace cupp {
00013 
00022 class device;
00023 
00024 template <typename host_type, typename device_type>
00025 class kernel_call_traits {
00026         public:
00033                 static device_type get_host_based_device_copy (const device &d, const host_type& that) {
00034                         return that.get_host_based_device_copy(d);
00035                 }
00036                 
00043                 static shared_device_pointer<device_type> get_device_based_device_copy (const device &d, const host_type& that) {
00044                         return that.get_device_based_device_copy(d);
00045                 }
00046                 
00054                 static void dirty (const device &d, const host_type& that, shared_device_pointer<device_type> device_copy) {
00055                         that.dirty(d, device_copy);
00056                 }
00057 };
00058 
00062 template <typename type>
00063 class kernel_call_traits <type, type> {
00064         public:
00068                 inline static const type& get_host_based_device_copy (const device &d, const type& that) {
00069                         return that;
00070                 }
00071                 
00075                 inline static shared_device_pointer<type> get_device_based_device_copy (const device &d, const type& that) {
00076                         // copy device_copy into global memory
00077                         shared_device_pointer<type> device_copy_ptr ( cupp::malloc<type>() );
00078 
00080                         cupp::copy_host_to_device(device_copy_ptr, &get_host_based_device_copy(d, that));
00081 
00082                         return device_copy_ptr;
00083                 }
00084 
00088                 inline static void dirty (const device &d, const type& that, shared_device_pointer<type> device_copy) {
00089                         // do a dirty ugly bit copy from device memory to host memory
00090                         cupp::copy_device_to_host ( const_cast<type*>(&that), device_copy );
00091                 }
00092 };
00093 
00094 
00095 } // cupp
00096 
00097 #endif //CUPP_kernel_call_traits_H
